page.title: 07TOURISM IN ROBIN HOODS BAY
page.content: to see the beach and sea and some came to walk or swim. 84% made no suggestions about improving Bay. 4% said they wanted to be allowed to go down the bank in cars. 8% said they wished the beach had more sand. Some of the residents are not too happy about tourists in Bay because of all the noise children make and all the litter they drop, especially in the holiday season from about mid-June to about September. But the visitors are welcome in the summer to buy souvenirs, such as postcards, ships in bottles, presents for relatives, pottery and perfumes to help them remember their holidays. It is such an interesting village with its narrow cobbled streets and steps to the tiny cottages.
